name: Farm Wars: The Farmer´s Wrath
description:
Farm Wars the farmer's wrath is a survival roguelike where you protect your farm from an alien invasion by shooting them and sometimes get temporary weapons or recover your health to continue your battle against the aliens.

You start with your standard shotgun, but you can choose temporary cards that can give your weapon special powers.

    [*[b]]Power-up Cards: [/b]Cards that can give temporary special powers to your shotgun.

  • Recover life Card: A card that can change the outcome of your game because it can give you all your life when you are about to die, but you need a lot of luck for it to appear.
